short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display the Scottish Episcopal Church digital calendar and lectionary in a toolbar popup window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View the Scottish Episcopal Church digital calendar and lectionary in a popup window on your web browser's toolbar.

Save time with this handy browser extension to quickly view today's church feast (including liturgical colour, readings and collect) in a popup window on your browser's toolbar.

The toolbar button opens the full website in mobile-view in a small window, so you can access everything on the SEC digital calendar website within the toolbar popup.

Want to move everything to a full tab? Right-click a link and select 'Open link in new tab'.
